entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022
